title: Artists of Mt Best
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Gippsland (Vic.) - Description and travel
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Community life
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Rural conditions

abstract: Meet the artists who inhabit Mount Best, their work, lives and the things that inspire them. Filmed as part of 'ACMI in the Regions: Stories from South Gippsland'.
description: Mt Best is full of artists who have been inspired by the beauty, changing light and drama of this region in the Strezlecki Ranges.  In this film we meet painters, photographers and musicians who talk about what drew them to the area, how the weather informs their work and how the community inspire each other.
